member.name: T:Qhta.SF.Tools.GridColumnInfo
member.summary: Information about a grid column, including its mapping name and value property. It is needed if we want to operate on the data in the grid in the background thread, as in this case operations on the grid (and on the grid column) are not possible.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.GridColumnInfo.#ctor(Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.GridColumn,System.String,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Information about a grid column, including its mapping name and value property. It is needed if we want to operate on the data in the grid in the background thread, as in this case operations on the grid (and on the grid column) are not possible.

member.summary: Identifies the column in the grid.

member.summary: Mapping name of the column, which corresponds to the property name in the data source.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.Tools.GridColumnInfo.ValuePropertyInfo
member.summary: Gets the object that represents the metadata of the value property.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.Tools.GridColumnInfo.DisplayPropertyInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that represents the property to be displayed. It is an optional property, used for example in to display the value from the items source.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.Tools.GridColumnInfo.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of items to be displayed. it is an optional property, used for example in to provide the items source for the combo box.

member.summary: Interface for providing row height in a data grid.

member.summary: Gets or sets the height of a row in the grid.

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.Tools.LongTextColumn
member.summary: Represents a column in a data grid that adjusts its row height based on the content length.
member.remarks: The class is designed to work with data grids where the row height needs to be dynamically adjusted to fit the content of cells containing long text. It listens to the to determine the appropriate height for each row based on the text content and the expansion state of the text.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.LongTextColumn.OnQueryRowHeight(System.Object,Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.QueryRowHeightEventArgs)
member.summary: Adjusts the height of a row in a based on the content of long text columns.
member.remarks: This method calculates the required height for a row by evaluating the content of columns that implement . If the data associated with the row implements and the long text is expanded, the method sets the row height to accommodate the text. The height is adjusted only if the row index is valid and the text is not empty. The method marks the event as handled after setting the height.
member.param: The source of the event, typically an instance of .
The event data containing information about the row height query.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.LongTextColumn.GetCellText(Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.GridColumn,System.Object)
member.summary: Retrieves the text representation of a cell's value from a specified data item and column.
member.param: The column that specifies which property of the data item to retrieve.
The data item from which the cell value is extracted.
member.returns: A string representation of the cell's value. Returns an empty string if the property is not found or the value is null.

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.Tools.MappingNameToValueConverter
member.summary: A value converter that retrieves the value of a property specified by the mapping name from a .

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.MappingNameToValueConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a value to a string representation based on the value of the mapped property.
member.remarks: The method checks if the is a and if its column is a . It then retrieves the property value from the data context using the column's mapping name. If the mapping name is null or empty, or if the property cannot be found, the method returns an empty string.
member.param: The value to convert, expected to be of type .
The type to which the value is being converted. This parameter is not used in the conversion process.
An optional parameter for the conversion. This parameter is not used in the conversion process.
The culture to use in the conversion process. This parameter is not used in the conversion process.
member.returns: A string representation of the property value specified by the column mapping name if the conversion is successful; otherwise, an empty string.

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar
member.summary: Navigation bar for navigating through records in a . It provides commands to navigate to the first, previous, next, and last records. It also displays the current record number and the total number of records in the grid. It should be placed under the .
RecordNavigationBar

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: This constructor sets up the navigation commands for moving between records. It initializes the component and assigns commands for navigating to the next, last, previous, and first items.

member.name: F:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.DataGridProperty
member.summary: Dependency property for the associated with this navigation bar.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.DataGridChanged(Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.SfDataGrid)
member.summary: Updates the binding of the to reflect the current item count of the specified data grid.
member.remarks: This method sets a binding on the to the item count of the provided data grid's data source. Ensure that the is not before calling this method.
member.param: The whose item count is used to update the binding. Cannot be .

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.DataGrid
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance associated with this component.

member.name: F:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.RowsCountProperty
member.summary: Dependency property for the number of rows in the .

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.RowsCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of rows in the collection.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.NextItemCommand
member.summary: Command to navigate to the next item in the .

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.NextItemExecute
member.summary: Selects the next item in the data grid, if available.
member.remarks: This method increments the selected index of the data grid by one, provided that the data grid is not null and the current selection is not the last item. If the selection is successfully updated, the new item is scrolled into view.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.LastItemCommand
member.summary: Command to navigate to the last item in the .

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.LastItemExecute
member.summary: Selects the last item in the data grid and scrolls it into view.
member.remarks: This method sets the selected index of the data grid to the last item and ensures it is visible by scrolling it into view. If the data grid is not initialized, the method exits without making changes.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.PreviousItemCommand
member.summary: Command to navigate to the previous item in the .

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.PreviousItemExecute
member.summary: Selects the previous item in the data grid, if possible.
member.remarks: This method decreases the selected index of the data grid by one, if the current selection is not already at the first item. If the data grid is null or the first item is selected, the method does nothing.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.FirstItemCommand
member.summary: Command to navigate to the first item in the .

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.FirstItemExecute
member.summary: Selects and executes the first item in the data grid.
member.remarks: This method sets the selected index of the data grid to the first item and ensures it is scrolled into view. If the data grid is not initialized, the method exits without performing any action.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.ScrollInView(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method scrolls the specified row into view in the .

member.name: E:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a property value changes.
member.remarks: This event is typically used to notify clients, such as user interfaces, that a property value has changed.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.NotifyPropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Notifies subscribers that a property value has changed.
member.remarks: This method raises the event, which is used to notify listeners, typically UI elements, that a property value has changed.
member.param: The name of the property that changed. This value is optional and can be automatically supplied by the compiler.

member.summary: InitializeComponent

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.Tools.RowHeightProvider
member.summary: Provides functionality to determine the height of rows in a data grid.
member.remarks: This class contains methods that interact with data grid events to set row heights based on the data context.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RowHeightProvider.OnQueryRowHeight(System.Object,Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.QueryRowHeightEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the query for row height in a data grid, setting the height based on the data context.
member.remarks: This method checks if the data context for the specified row index implements . If so, and the row height is not set to , it assigns the row height from the data context to the event arguments and marks the event as handled.
member.param: The source of the event, typically an instance of .
The containing event data, including the row index and a property to set the row height.

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.Tools.RowResizer
member.summary: A control that allows resizing of rows in a . It is typically used at the bottom of the row header of a grid to adjust the height of rows. This class was written on the basis of the class, but adapted for rows.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RowResizer.OnRenderSizeChanged(System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo)
member.summary: Override for

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RowResizer.PreviewAdorner.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Derived class must implement to support Visual children. The method must return child at the specified index. Index must be between 0 and GetVisualChildrenCount-1.
By default, a Visual does not have any children.
Remark: During this virtual call it is not valid to modify the Visual tree.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.Tools.RowResizer.PreviewAdorner.VisualChildrenCount
member.summary:
Derived classes override this property to enable the Visual code to enumerate the Visual children. Derived classes need to return the number of children from this method.
By default, a Visual does not have any children.
Remark: During this virtual method the Visual tree must not be modified.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.RowResizer.RoundLayoutValue(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the value to be used for layout rounding at high DPI.
member.param: Input value to be rounded.
Ratio of screen's DPI to layout DPI
member.returns: Adjusted value that will produce layout rounding on screen at high dpi.
member.remarks: This is a layout helper method. It takes DPI into account and also does not return the rounded value if it is unacceptable for layout, e.g. Infinity or NaN. It's a helper associated with UseLayoutRounding property and should not be used as a general rounding utility.

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnBehavior
member.summary: A behavior class for managing the selection state of a in a Syncfusion DataGrid.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnBehavior.GetIsSelected(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets whether the column is selected.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnBehavior.SetIsSelected(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the selection state of the column.

member.name: F:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnBehavior.IsSelectedProperty
member.summary: Attached dependency property that indicates whether the column is selected.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnBehavior.OnIsSelectedChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles changes to the IsSelected property of a GridColumn.
member.remarks: This method updates the styles of the GridColumn based on its selection state. If the column is selected, it applies the "SelectedColumnHeaderStyle" and "SelectedGridStyle" resources. If not selected, it resets the header style to its default and applies the "UnselectedGridStyle" to the cell style.
member.param: The dependency object that represents the GridColumn whose IsSelected property has changed.
The event data that contains information about the property change, including the new value.

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnConverter
member.summary: Provides a mechanism to convert objects to specific property values for data binding in a .
member.remarks: This converter is used to extract specific properties from instances, such as the selection state.

member.name: F:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnConverter.LogIt
member.summary: Debug flag to enable or disable logging of conversion operations.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a object to a specified property value based on the provided parameter.
member.param: The object to convert, expected to be of type .
The type to which the value is being converted. This parameter is not used in the conversion process.
A string specifying the property name to retrieve from the . Must be "IsSelected".
The culture to use in the converter. This parameter is not used in the conversion process.
member.returns: The value of the specified property from the . For "IsSelected", returns the selection state.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a string or if the property name is not recognized.
Thrown if is not of type .

member.summary: Unimplemented method for converting back from the target type to the source type.

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridTools
member.summary: Provides utility methods for handling mouse interactions with the header and row header cells in a .
member.remarks: This class contains methods that manage the selection behavior of columns and rows when interacting with the grid's header cells. It supports features such as toggling column selection and clearing or setting selections based on user input.
member.summary: SfDataGridTools

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridTools.GridHeaderCellControl_MouseLeftButtonDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the mouse left button down event on a . This method toggles the IsSelected state of the column when the header cell is clicked. It also manages the selection of multiple columns based on the Shift and Control keys pressed during the click event.
member.remarks: If the column enables filtering or sorting, then selection is possible only if the mouse click position omits filter icon or sorting icon on the right of the header control. This condition allows the method to be handled on th PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown event of the header cell control, ensuring that the sorting functionality is not triggered when the user intends to select the column instead.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridTools.GridRowHeaderIndentCell_MouseLeftButtonDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the left mouse button down event on a grid row header indent cell to toggle the selection of the whole grid.
member.remarks: This method toggles the selection state of the grid's columns. If any cells are currently selected, it clears the selection. Otherwise, it selects or deselects all columns based on their current state.
member.param: The source of the event, expected to be a .
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.Tools.SfDataGridTools.InitializeComponent
member.summary: InitializeComponent
